name: Sweet Desire
description:
Sweet Desire is a pleasurable hentai game with animated pictures of hot and sexy girls!
Each level consists of scenes with a beauty in marvelous clothing.
Click on a girl to pleasure her and to collect points. The more you click, the more points you get.
When you have enough points, then the girl puts clothes off!

Multiply your points by clicking on game improvements on the right.
Improvements with poses in a store on the right do not give any animation, they just give improvements to your clicks. But you can imagine everything in your head!

Discover what the lovely girls hide under the dress!
Unlock all the hot girls!

After you successfully make a sexy girl naked, then you will find her any time at a game gallery.
If you close the game, your score is saved. You can continue from the level you ended any time or play the game from the beginning.



What you can find in the hentai clicker Sweet Desire:

— 10 levels with attractive girls;
— animated hot girls;
— different scenes, poses and costumes;
— different locations;
— 7 game improvements for getting more points;
— game gallery with cute girls;
— realistic voices and visual effects;
— amazing graphic.

This hentai game is incredible, amusing and easy to play! High-level animation attracts attention and keeps it until the end.
Do not hesitate! Beautiful girls are waiting for you in Sweet Desire!
